*** 408,11 ***
   * A GRegex is the "compiled" form of a regular expression pattern.
   * This structure is opaque and its fields cannot be accessed directly.
   *
   * Since: 2.14
   */
! typedef struct _GRegex      GRegex;
  
  
  /**
   * GMatchInfo:
   *
